reviews.review_msg: I was terrified of chemistry before entering this class but she really does go out of her way to make sure that eveyrbody is able to do the work. You can tell that she cares about her students and loves chemistry! I would recoomend her and hope to have her in later chem courses.

Good prof, explained concepts very well and lecture notes reflected the midterm and final questions perfectly. Lots of loncapa to do, but honestly the loncapa felt harder than the tests so highly recommended to do them all for good practice.

James is an amazing lecturer. His notes reflect exactly what will be tested and are very clear. Very easy to succeed in this course if u put in the work and practice. Midterm and final were very fair if you know the material. I would definitely recommend taking a class with him if you can!

**CHEM 110 An awesome professor! Lecture notes were clear and engaging and referred to real-life examples for concepts. James always emailed back quickly and even offered explanations through Zoom. Assignments and exams were fair if you studied every week and kept up with the course content. I've never rated before but he was worth the 5/5 rating.

*CHEM 121*
James was super friendly and although morning classes are not my favourite, I always looked forward to attending his lectures. His exams were very fair, and reflected heavily on what we learned, practice questions, and lon-capa questions. He's a good prof and I would definitely love to take another class with him!

Was really clear on what to expect for tests and his Lecture content was concise. I enjoyed how he would teach us concepts and apply them to scenarios, unlike other chem profs which are too busy focusing on the history of the discoveries.
Amazing prof. Quizzes and exams have the exact same problems as homework does.
Good prof, homework and quizzes are a little difficult. Lets you know what things to expect on exams, and tips to know things better. Quite helpful as well when it comes to questions.
Such a good professor, take chem with him if you can
